verses.verse: The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is on <S%H3068>me;<s%> because Yahweh has <S%H4886>anointed<s%> me to preach good <S%H1319>news<s%> to the <S%H6035>humble.<s%> He has <S%H7971>sent<s%> me to bind <S%H2280>up<s%> the <S%H7665>brokenhearted,<s%> to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> to the <S%H7617>captives,<s%> and <S%H6495>release<s%> to those who are <S%H631>bound;<s%>

to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H7522>favor,<s%> and the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%> of our <S%H430>God;<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> all who <S%H57>mourn;<s%>

to <S%H7760>appoint<s%> to those who <S%H57>mourn<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to them a <S%H6287>garland<s%> for <S%H665>ashes,<s%> the <S%H8081>oil<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%> for <S%H60>mourning,<s%> the <S%H4594>garment<s%> of <S%H8416>praise<s%> for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3544>heaviness;<s%> that they may be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H352>trees<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> the <S%H4302>planting<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> that he may be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

They shall <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5769>old<s%> <S%H2723>wastes,<s%> they shall raise <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H8074>desolations,<s%> and they shall <S%H2318>repair<s%> the <S%H2721>waste<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> the <S%H8074>desolations<s%> of <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H2114>Strangers<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> and <S%H7462>feed<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and <S%H5236>foreigners<s%> <S%H1121><s%> shall be your <S%H406>plowmen<s%> and your <S%H3755>vinedressers.<s%>

But you shall be <S%H7121>named<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> men will <S%H559>call<s%> you the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of our <S%H430>God:<s%> you will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and you will <S%H3235>boast<s%> in their <S%H3519>glory.<s%>

Instead of your <S%H1322>shame<s%> you shall have <S%H4932>double;<s%> and instead of <S%H3639>dishonor<s%> they shall <S%H7442>rejoice<s%> in their <S%H2506>portion:<s%> therefore in their <S%H776>land<s%> they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H4932>double;<s%> <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> joy shall be to <S%H8057>them.<s%>

"For <S%H3068>I,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H4941>justice,<s%> I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1498>robbery<s%> with <S%H5930>iniquity;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them their <S%H6468>recompense<s%> in <S%H571>truth,<s%> and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> covenant with <S%H1285>them.<s%>

Their <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> all who <S%H7200>see<s%> them shall <S%H5234>acknowledge<s%> <S%H2233>them,<s%> that they are the seed which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed.<s%>"

I will <S%H7797>greatly<s%> <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in my <S%H430>God;<s%> for he has <S%H3847>clothed<s%> me with the <S%H899>garments<s%> of <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> he has <S%H3271>covered<s%> me with the <S%H4598>robe<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> as a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> <S%H3547>decks<s%> himself with a <S%H6287>garland,<s%> and as a <S%H3618>bride<s%> <S%H5710>adorns<s%> herself with her <S%H3627>jewels.<s%>

For as the <S%H776>earth<s%> brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> its <S%H6780>bud,<s%> and as the <S%H1593>garden<s%> causes the things that are <S%H2221>sown<s%> in it to spring <S%H6779>forth;<s%> so the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> will cause <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H8416>praise<s%> to spring <S%H6779>forth<s%> before all the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
